slides.title: Introduction: Unlocking AI Superpower
narration: Imagine talking to a super-intelligent alien.
This alien is very literal.
It lacks human common sense.
It knows no cultural context.
You must be crystal clear with it.
This analogy perfectly describes AI interaction.
slides.image_prompt: A friendly, curious alien character sitting at a computer, looking slightly confused but ready to learn, with human hands typing nearby.

slides.title: Clarity & Specificity: The Foundation
content: Good: 'Write a short paragraph about electric cars.'
Better: 'Write 150 words for a blog post. Explain 3 environmental benefits of electric cars. Use an enthusiastic and informative tone.'
narration: Let's see clarity in action.
A weak prompt is 'Write about cars.' This is too broad.
A good prompt is 'Write a short paragraph about electric cars.' This adds focus.
A better prompt specifies word count and tone.
slides.image_prompt: A magnifying glass focusing on a single, clear word, contrasting with blurry, vague words in the background. Shows evolution of a prompt from weak to better.

slides.title: Context & Constraints: Setting the Stage
content: Good: 'Tell me a short story about a brave knight.'
Better: 'Write a 300-word fantasy story. For 8-10 year old children. Feature a brave knight saving a dragon. It must have a happy ending. Avoid any violence.'
narration: Now let's add context and constraints.
A weak prompt is 'Tell me a story.' This gives no direction.
A good one specifies 'a brave knight.'
A better prompt adds many details.
slides.image_prompt: A director's clapboard setting the scene, with a spotlight on a stage, indicating context and boundaries. Text 'Context' and 'Constraints'.

slides.title: Persona, Tone & Examples: Adding Finesse
content: Better: 'Act as a passionate astrophysicist. Write an inspiring 200-word social media post. About future human space travel. Use an optimistic, poetic tone. Target young people for STEM careers.'
narration: Finally, let's refine with persona, tone, and examples.
A weak prompt is 'Write about space travel.' It's generic.
A better prompt assigns a persona: 'passionate astrophysicist'.
It also specifies tone and target audience.
For complex tasks, include few-shot examples to guide the AI.
slides.image_prompt: A theatrical mask split into two halves: one side showing a specific persona (e.g., scientist), the other a particular emotion (e.g., inspiring). Also includes small visual cues for 'examples'.

slides.title: Summary: Key Takeaways
content: Prompting is a dialogue, not a monologue.
narration: Let's recap our key takeaways.
Always be clear and specific.
Provide sufficient context.
Set clear constraints.
Use personas and define the tone.
Employ few-shot examples for complex tasks.
Remember, prompting is an iterative dialogue.
slides.image_prompt: A mind map or web of interconnected concepts, with 'Clarity', 'Context', 'Persona', 'Iteration' as central nodes, showing how they form a complete system.

slides.title: Assignment: Craft Your Master Prompt
content: 3. Generate 5 blog headlines for healthy eating.
Craft a prompt for your chosen scenario.
narration: Now for your assignment.
Choose one scenario from the screen.
First, craft a LinkedIn post for a new product feature.
Or, summarize a scientific article for students.
Alternatively, generate five blog headlines for healthy eating.
Craft a detailed prompt for your chosen scenario.
Ensure it includes clarity, context, and constraints.
Also consider persona and tone. [Pause]
